7 years after the Final Chapter we get another Saw movie Will this be a new beginning I don t know. I guess the studios wanted to see if the Saw name could still bring any money 💰. The Spierig Brothers who made the excellent Predestination takes on this movie And it glad they were able to correct some of the mist akes made in other films. First they got rid of the annoying choppy editing which was the worst. Then there was the ugly color filter ing that always bothered me. It was gone This movie actually looked clean and n ice for a change. The bad acting was cut down I never found any of the people that were going to be killed in the traps were particularly likable The people in this movie I never really cared for them but I didn t find them annoying either. That being said this is a very unnecessary sequel It was clearly a money move and the story just felt very conventional. With 8 movies it s very predictable and there were very few memorable traps to.
